text: @Mike_Pence Donald Trump  is hiding something?  All of a sudden he is interested in showing up in church?  John Bolton detail criminal wrong doing but I think there's even more.  I suspect an illegal distrubution scheme with the relief funds?  https://t.co/Vq57pbVJ4i
